title: Whenever I load client it loads an earlier patch and I have to keep updating it to the current patch
body: I have to download to the latest patch every single time I open the game, it's been happening for about a week.

replies.body: Are you saving league to a new or different folder to store League?  League mainly prefers to save in the C:/ drive so using an external drive instead, for example, can cause the patcher to redownload files every time.  Let me know if that clears things up!
